text: numbalage paramadhipatigen vu bhagyaya numbala sevima numbala kerehi varadak nomæta. ebævin numbala arafa pradesayan hi sita (bæhæra vi gamgavak men) gala a vita masarul haram nam sthanaye allah va sihipat karanu. mita pera numbala nomanga giyavun aturin sitiya di ohu numbalata mangapen vu ayurin numbala da ohu va sihipat karanu
